thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Dongxing Securities' Shares Involving 738 Mln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Exchange Filing Shows Block Trade Of Dongxing Securities' Shares Involving 738 Mln Yuan

organizations.name: brief-shanghai exchange filing shows block trade of dongxing securities

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Dongxing Securities Co Ltd:
* SHANGHAI STOCK EXCHANGE FILING SHOWS BLOCK TRADE OF DONGXING SECURITIES' 55.2 MILLION SHARES INVOLVING 738.0 MILLION YUAN ($116.82 million) ON MARCH 7 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2yJZikT Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3174 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
